post_content: :).... Finally did it. For all the years I've been playing intramural soccer at UMD, I've tried so many times to score when I still playing goalie myself. Tonight I finally got it. It helps quite a bit that intramural soccer here (in the fall) is only 6v6 (and field hockey goals) so that making a full field run is quite a bit easier. I love the suprise on the other teams face when I drop the ball and run out of my box for a crazy goalie counter attack. With most of the other team behind me, I only had to beat one player and take a shot (which 99.9% of the time is completely inaccurate. Guess tonight was my lucky night :)...
